data.text: @picksuppennies @almostbrenda @KristyLKnapp @StephTheBlogger Right? I want neither. Yes, I'd prefer a cold covid to an immediate pneumononia covid but how's about neither and no colds?
@almostbrenda @KristyLKnapp @StephTheBlogger Girl. I am sick AGAIN. At this point, I am getting positively stabby when I hear people say “covid is just a bad cold”. OK BUT COLDS ARE AWFUL.
@KristyLKnapp @StephTheBlogger I just did a home test and it’s negative. I guess it really is just a different type of rough cold

@StephTheBlogger @almostbrenda Ben’s home test came back negative but PCR was positive and he basically had a stuffy nose. I got it much worse bc I was pregnant and couldn’t take anything for it to ease congestion.
@almostbrenda @StephTheBlogger If you have good access #RATs, you can test to find out tomorrow morning or the day after. Do you sore throat feels like razor blades cutting it?
@StephTheBlogger That it could be either? I think?
@almostbrenda Are they saying this is what mild covid feels like, or that you actually do have covid?
